docblock.description: beforeSave is called before a model is saved. Returning false from a beforeSave callback will abort the save operation.

tag.name: return
tag.description: False if the operation should abort. Any other result will continue.

docblock.description: beforeValidate is called before a model is validated, you can use this callback to add behavior validation rules into a models validate array. Returning false will allow you to make the validation fail.

tag.name: return
tag.description: False or null will abort the operation. Any other result will continue.

docblock.description: Checks wether model has the required fields

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if $model has the required fields

tag.name: param
tag.description: Type of find operation (all / first / count / neighbors / list / threaded)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Option fields (conditions / fields / joins / limit / offset / order / page / group / callbacks)

tag.name: return
tag.description: status on success, false on error

tag.name: return
tag.description: status on success, false on error

docblock.description: Function to get the data of BlockRolePermmissions.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Role and Permissions data - The `Role` merged of Role and RoomRole - The `Permission` sets in priority of BlockRolePermission and RoomRolePermission and DefaultRolePermission.

docblock.description: Function to get the data of RoomRolePermmissions.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Role and Permissions and Rooms data - The `DefaultPermissions` data. - The `Roles` data. - The `RolesRooms` data. - The `RoomRolePermissions` data. - The `RoomRoles` data.

docblock.description: Before render callback. beforeRender is called before the view file is rendered.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The view file that is going to be rendered

tag.name: param
tag.description: If true is add to panel footer div, then false is not div.

docblock.description: Creates a `<a>` tag for publish link link. The type attribute defaults

tag.name: param
tag.description: The button's caption. Not automatically HTML encoded
